author: gadams
msg: Bugzilla #51043: Don't restart layout unless abs(ipd difference)>1 in order to prevent rounding issues from triggering false restart.

author: gadams
msg: Bugzilla #50492: Removing experimental feature that violates XSL-FO and Unicode semantics by misinterpreting Basic Latin code points. Users must use private use codepoints to access font specific character mappings that have no assigned Unicode code point.
